name: Ratanaba
description:
Ratanaba is a runner game, based on endless running, but the difference is that it has phases. 
At each stage the player wins a card for his collection, which tells the story of characters from Brazilian folklore.
The gameplay of the game is very basic, the game has only one track, with obstacles at the top, bottom and forks that can make the map smaller or larger. 
The game for now is being implemented only on android, so to move, just use the touch of the cell phone downwards to dodge objects at the top, upwards to jump from objects on the ground and sideways at forks.
